articles.author: Lisa Eadicicco
articles.title: Amazon’s layoffs are staggering. We’ve seen this before - CNN
articles.description: Big Tech continues to wrestle with mass layoffs, most recently with Amazon’s announcement of 16,000 job cuts. It’s a trend that started long before the AI race: organizational change brought by the arrival of new technology.
articles.content: Big Tech continues to wrestle with mass layoffs, most recently with Amazons announcement to slash 16,000 jobs. Its a trend that started long before the AI race: organizational change brought by the a… [+3923 chars]

articles.author: Scharon Harding
articles.title: The TV industry finally concedes that the future may not be in 8K - Ars Technica
articles.description: With virtually no content and limited benefits, 8K TVs were doomed.
